glsa.title: Fail2ban: Multiple vulnerabilities
glsa.synopsis: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in Fail2ban, the worst of which allows remote attackers to cause a Denial of Service condition.

background.p: Fail2ban is a tool for parsing log files and banning IP addresses which show suspicious behavior.

description.p: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in Fail2ban. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.

impact.p: A remote attacker could send a crafted URL to a web site which, when parsed by Fail2ban, would deny a specific IP address. Also, errors in regular expressions within certain filters can cause arbitrary IP addresses to be banned. Furthermore, a local attacker could perform symlink attacks to overwrite arbitrary files with the privileges of the user running the application.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.
